actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill entitled "The Clinch River Breeder Reactor Project Determination Act of 1983".

summary.text: Terminates the Clinch River breeder reactor project on January 1, 1984, unless by such date Congress approves a plan providing for the payment of one-half of all future costs of the project by nongovernmental entities without governmental guarantees or agreements to indemnify such entities against risks with respect to the project.

titles.title: A bill entitled "The Clinch River Breeder Reactor Project Determination Act of 1983".
